title: Immersive Education Design Based on Clinical Virtual Reality Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamentals of medical terminology and clinical procedures, along with basic digital device operation skills
context.additional_context: Students use VR devices (headsets/smartphones) via BYOD, conducting scenario-based practical training simulating real clinical environments.

learning_goals: ≥80% proficiency in performing three-stage clinical processes (diagnosis to treatment planning) in VR simulation environments
≥75% improvement in decision-making accuracy under stress-inducing virtual scenarios (e.g., emergency situations)
90% enhancement in role distribution and communication efficiency through team-based collaboration simulations
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
